input.sentences: the friends and family gathered at he park for the day .
the casserole that was made was half eaten .
the city skyline looked beautiful that night .
the man was seen near the dock with a bottle .
output.sentences: Friends gathered in the park for a picnic to start their day of festivities.
At the end of the meal, they were wondering what they should do with the half eaten casserole so that it wouldn't spoil in their car.
As evening descended, they looked towards the city skyline and realized full night would be upon them soon.
It was time to head toward the dock and share a bottle of wine.
The celebration ended with a spectacular fireworks display over the water.
